title: Fix award photos not displaying in Awards & Recognition section

requirements.text: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx) so that all 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) render visibly and correctly. Ensure each tag has a valid src path starting with '/assets/generated/', correct alt text, an explicit container size with object-fit: cover, and no CSS rules that hide or zero-size the images. Verify the static asset files exist at frontend/public/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg.

quotes: photos show nhi ho rahe hai

acceptanceCriteria: All 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) are visible on the About page in the Awards & Recognition section
Each image src attribute is set to '/assets/generated/award-photo-XX.jpeg' (absolute path from public root)
Each image has a defined container height and object-fit: cover so images are not zero-sized
No CSS rule sets display:none, visibility:hidden, or height:0 on the award photo elements
Images load without 404 errors in the browser network tab
